name: Weezing
author: Motofumi Fujiwara
flavor_text: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.

abilities.name: Blow-Away Bomb
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you discard this Pokémon with the effect of Roxie, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Place damage counters after the effect of Roxie.)

attacks.name: Balloon Burst
attacks.effect: Discard this Pokémon and all cards attached to it.
